remarks: Subtraction in a group power.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwsgrp.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsinvg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwssub.m $e |- M = ( -g ` R ) $.
pwssub.n $e |- .- = ( -g ` Y ) $.
pwssub $p |- ( ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V ) /\ ( F e. B /\ G e. B ) ) -> ( F .- G ) = ( F oF M G ) ) $.
